thread.title: Amazing.com Prepares For Upcoming Amazing Selling Machine Course, Releases Four-Part Introductory Training On How To Start An Amazon Business
thread.title_full: Amazing.com Prepares For Upcoming Amazing Selling Machine Course, Releases Four-Part Introductory Training On How To Start An Amazon Business

author: admin
title: Amazing.com Prepares For Upcoming Amazing Selling Machine Course, Releases Four-Part Introductory Training On How To Start An Amazon Business
text:
Submitted by admin on 10/2/2015 @ 9:00 AM   Amazing.com 
AUSTIN, Texas, Oct. 2, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Amazing.com, an online hub for entrepreneurs, released a four-part video series teaching anyone how to start a business on Amazon. The EdTech startup aims to help people around the world achieve financial freedom with its video series. Amazing.com is sharing their video series in preparation for the upcoming launch of their flagship course: Amazing Selling Machine*. 
The four-part video series shows the basic steps to building a highly profitable business selling your own brand of physical products on the mega-ecommerce platform Amazon. With thousands of successful students, Amazing.com has proven to be incredibly effective at getting people results, regardless of their previous experience with selling online. 
The introductory Amazon training can be found at http://amazing.com/free-amazon-training . 
About Amazing.com 
Founded in 2013, Amazing.com is redefining entrepreneurship by helping people build their own businesses. Offering results-focused training, exceptional business tools, and a strong, supportive online community, the company empowers people from all walks of life to become successful business owners. 
Amazing.com offers a variety of courses to help every level of entrepreneur, from beginner to veteran, build or boost their business. They achieve this by partnering with proven, entrepreneurial business leaders to develop and teach their courses. 
Amazing.com has over 16,000 students to date in over 100 countries. In addition to Amazing Selling Machine, the 2-year-old Austin startup offers numerous other courses on how to start new businesses and grow existing businesses in various industries. 
*Amazing Selling Machine has a retail price of $4,997. 
To view the original version on PR Newswire, visit: http://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/amazingcom-prepares-for-upcoming-amazing-selling-machine-course-releases-four-part-introductory-training-on-how-to-start-an-amazon-business-300153293.html 
SOURCE Amazing.com
